Articles.Content:
Well this is the third time I've written this post cause my browser keeps crashing so its gotten really short.

I made a Duna lander that returns itself to Kerbin with all of it's tasties. Enjoy here: http://imgur.com/a/xtUTW#0

BUT the main reason for this thread is the idea of having multiple landers that dock with a return ship and then discard their lander bits, just keep the science. I want to see what you guys can do, I'm going to try this myself today I think.
